entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:44 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Windsor Airport 08:48 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 3.5°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 3.4°C
Wind: E 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 60 gusting to 80 this afternoon. High 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 late this evening then light before morning. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
